children: Etesu
yena ye dhammā, pahātabbā bhavanti hi;
innerText: Etesu yena ye dhammā, pahātabbā bhavanti hi;

Imesu pana catūsu maggañāṇesu ye dhammā yena ñāṇena pahātabbā, tesaṃ pahānamevaṃ veditabbaṃ. Etāni hi yathāyogaṃ saṃyojanakilesamicchattalokadhammamacchariyavipallāsaganthāgatiāsava- oghayoganīvaraṇaparāmāsaupādānānusayamalaakusalakammapatha- akusalacittuppādasaṅkhātānaṃ pahānakarāni.

children: Tattha

ti dasa saṃyojanāni. Seyyathidaṃ – rūparāgārūparāgamānauddhaccāvijjāti ime pañca uddhaṃbhāgiyasaṃyojanāni nāma. Sakkāyadiṭṭhi vicikicchā sīlabbataparāmāso kāmarāgo paṭighoti ime pañca adhobhāgiyasaṃyojanāni nāma.
innerText: Tattha saṃyojanānīti dasa saṃyojanāni. Seyyathidaṃ – rūparāgārūparāgamānauddhaccāvijjāti ime pañca uddhaṃbhāgiyasaṃyojanāni nāma. Sakkāyadiṭṭhi vicikicchā sīlabbataparāmāso kāmarāgo paṭighoti ime pañca adhobhāgiyasaṃyojanāni nāma.

children: ti dasa kilesā. Seyyathidaṃ – lobho doso moho māno diṭṭhi vicikicchā thinaṃ uddhaccaṃ ahirikaṃ anottappanti.
innerText: Kilesāti dasa kilesā. Seyyathidaṃ – lobho doso moho māno diṭṭhi vicikicchā thinaṃ uddhaccaṃ ahirikaṃ anottappanti.

children: ti dasa micchattā. Seyyathidaṃ – micchādiṭṭhi micchāsaṅkappo micchāvācā micchākammanto micchāājīvo micchāvāyāmo micchāsati micchāsamādhi micchāñāṇaṃ micchāvimuttīti.
innerText: Micchattāti dasa micchattā. Seyyathidaṃ – micchādiṭṭhi micchāsaṅkappo micchāvācā micchākammanto micchāājīvo micchāvāyāmo micchāsati micchāsamādhi micchāñāṇaṃ micchāvimuttīti.

children: ti aṭṭha lokadhammā lābho alābho yaso ayaso nindā pasaṃsā sukhaṃ dukkhanti. Idha pana kāraṇūpacārena
lābhādivatthukassa anunayassa, alābhādivatthukassa paṭighassa cetaṃ lokadhammagahaṇena gahaṇaṃ katanti veditabbaṃ.
innerText: Lokadhammāti aṭṭha lokadhammā lābho alābho yaso ayaso nindā pasaṃsā sukhaṃ dukkhanti. Idha pana kāraṇūpacārena lābhādivatthukassa anunayassa, alābhādivatthukassa paṭighassa cetaṃ lokadhammagahaṇena gahaṇaṃ katanti veditabbaṃ.

children: ti pañca macchariyāni āvāsamacchariyaṃ kulamacchariyaṃ lābhamacchariyaṃ dhammamacchariyaṃ
vaṇṇamacchariyanti. Imāni āvāsādīsu aññesaṃ sādhāraṇabhāvaṃ asahanākārena pavattāni macchariyāni.
innerText: Macchariyānīti pañca macchariyāni āvāsamacchariyaṃ kulamacchariyaṃ lābhamacchariyaṃ dhammamacchariyaṃ vaṇṇamacchariyanti. Imāni āvāsādīsu aññesaṃ sādhāraṇabhāvaṃ asahanākārena pavattāni macchariyāni.

children: ti aniccadukkhaanattaasubhesuyeva
vatthūsu ‘‘niccaṃ sukhaṃ attā subha’’nti evaṃ pavattā saññāvipallāso cittavipallāso diṭṭhivipallāsoti ime tayo vipallāsā.
innerText: Vipallāsāti aniccadukkhaanattaasubhesuyeva vatthūsu ‘‘niccaṃ sukhaṃ attā subha’’nti evaṃ pavattā saññāvipallāso cittavipallāso diṭṭhivipallāsoti ime tayo vipallāsā.

children: ti cattāro ganthā abhijjhākāyagantho, byāpādo, sīlabbataparāmāso, idaṃsaccābhiniveso kāyaganthoti.
innerText: Ganthāti cattāro ganthā abhijjhākāyagantho, byāpādo, sīlabbataparāmāso, idaṃsaccābhiniveso kāyaganthoti.

children: ti chandadosamohabhayāni.
ti cattāro āsavā – kāmarāgabhavarāgamicchādiṭṭhiavijjāsavoti.
tipi tesamevādhivacanaṃ.
ti kāmacchandādayo.
ti micchādiṭṭhiyā adhivacanaṃ.
innerText: Agatīti chandadosamohabhayāni. Āsavāti cattāro āsavā – kāmarāgabhavarāgamicchādiṭṭhiavijjāsavoti. Oghayogānītipi tesamevādhivacanaṃ. Nīvaraṇānīti kāmacchandādayo. Parāmāsoti micchādiṭṭhiyā adhivacanaṃ.

children: ti cattāri upādānāni kāmupādānādīnīti.
ti satta anusayā kāmarāgānusayo paṭighamānadiṭṭhivicikicchābhavarāgāvijjānusayoti.
ti tayo malā – lobho doso mohoti.
innerText: Upādānāti cattāri upādānāni kāmupādānādīnīti. Anusayāti satta anusayā kāmarāgānusayo paṭighamānadiṭṭhivicikicchābhavarāgāvijjānusayoti. Malāti tayo malā – lobho doso mohoti.

children: ti dasa akusalakammapathā. Seyyathidaṃ – pāṇātipāto adinnādānaṃ kāmesumicchācāro musāvādo pisuṇavācā pharusavācā samphappalāpo abhijjhā byāpādo micchādiṭṭhīti dasa.
innerText: Akusalakammapathāti dasa akusalakammapathā. Seyyathidaṃ – pāṇātipāto adinnādānaṃ kāmesumicchācāro musāvādo pisuṇavācā pharusavācā samphappalāpo abhijjhā byāpādo micchādiṭṭhīti dasa.

children: ti
lobhamūlāni aṭṭha, dosamūlāni dve, mohamūlāni dveti ime dvādasāti.
innerText: Akusalacittuppādāti lobhamūlāni aṭṭha, dosamūlāni dve, mohamūlāni dveti ime dvādasāti.

children: Etesaṃ saṃyojanādīnaṃ etāni yathāsambhavaṃ pahānakarāni. Kathaṃ?

tāva sakkāyadiṭṭhivicikicchāsīlabbataparāmāsā apāyagamanīyā kāmarāgapaṭighāti ete paṭhamamaggañāṇavajjhā, sesā kāmarāgapaṭighā oḷārikā dutiyamaggañāṇavajjhā, sukhumā tatiyamaggañāṇavajjhā, rūparāgādayo pañcapi catutthamaggañāṇavajjhā eva.
innerText: Etesaṃ saṃyojanādīnaṃ etāni yathāsambhavaṃ pahānakarāni. Kathaṃ? Saṃyojanesu tāva sakkāyadiṭṭhivicikicchāsīlabbataparāmāsā apāyagamanīyā kāmarāgapaṭighāti ete paṭhamamaggañāṇavajjhā, sesā kāmarāgapaṭighā oḷārikā dutiyamaggañāṇavajjhā, sukhumā tatiyamaggañāṇavajjhā, rūparāgādayo pañcapi catutthamaggañāṇavajjhā eva.

children: diṭṭhivicikicchā paṭhamamaggañāṇavajjhā, doso tatiyamaggañāṇavajjho, lobhamohamānathinauddhaccaahirikānottappāni catutthamaggañāṇavajjhāni.
innerText: Kilesesu diṭṭhivicikicchā paṭhamamaggañāṇavajjhā, doso tatiyamaggañāṇavajjho, lobhamohamānathinauddhaccaahirikānottappāni catutthamaggañāṇavajjhāni.

children: micchādiṭṭhi musāvādo micchākammanto micchāājīvoti ime paṭhamamaggañāṇavajjhā, micchāsaṅkappo pisuṇavācā pharusavācāti ime tatiyamaggañāṇavajjhā, cetanāyeva cettha micchāvācāti veditabbā, samphappalāpamicchāvāyāmasatisamādhivimuttiñāṇāni catutthamaggañāṇavajjhāni.
innerText: Micchattesu micchādiṭṭhi musāvādo micchākammanto micchāājīvoti ime paṭhamamaggañāṇavajjhā, micchāsaṅkappo pisuṇavācā pharusavācāti ime tatiyamaggañāṇavajjhā, cetanāyeva cettha micchāvācāti veditabbā, samphappalāpamicchāvāyāmasatisamādhivimuttiñāṇāni catutthamaggañāṇavajjhāni.

children: paṭigho tatiyamaggañāṇavajjho, anunayo catutthamaggañāṇavajjho, yase pasaṃsāya ca anunayo catutthamaggañāṇavajjhoti eke.
innerText: Lokadhammesu paṭigho tatiyamaggañāṇavajjho, anunayo catutthamaggañāṇavajjho, yase pasaṃsāya ca anunayo catutthamaggañāṇavajjhoti eke.

children: paṭhamamaggañāṇavajjhāni eva.
pana anicce niccaṃ, anattani attāti ca saññācittadiṭṭhivipallāsā
, dukkhe sukhaṃ, asubhe subhanti diṭṭhivipallāso cāti ime paṭhamamaggañāṇavajjhā, asubhe subhanti saññācittavipallāsā tatiyamaggañāṇavajjhā, dukkhe sukhanti catutthamaggañāṇavajjhā.
innerText: Vipallāsesu pana anicce niccaṃ, anattani attāti ca saññācittadiṭṭhivipallāsā , dukkhe sukhaṃ, asubhe subhanti diṭṭhivipallāso cāti ime paṭhamamaggañāṇavajjhā, asubhe subhanti saññācittavipallāsā tatiyamaggañāṇavajjhā, dukkhe sukhanti catutthamaggañāṇavajjhā.

children: sīlabbataparāmāsaidaṃsaccābhinivesakāyaganthā paṭhamamaggañāṇavajjhā, byāpādakāyagantho tatiyamaggañāṇavajjho, abhijjhākāyagantho catutthamaggañāṇavajjhova.
innerText: Ganthesu sīlabbataparāmāsaidaṃsaccābhinivesakāyaganthā paṭhamamaggañāṇavajjhā, byāpādakāyagantho tatiyamaggañāṇavajjho, abhijjhākāyagantho catutthamaggañāṇavajjhova.

children: paṭhamamaggañāṇavajjhā.
diṭṭhāsavo paṭhamañāṇavajjho, kāmāsavo tatiyañāṇavajjho, itare dve catutthañāṇavajjhā.
pi eseva nayo.
innerText: Āsavesu diṭṭhāsavo paṭhamañāṇavajjho, kāmāsavo tatiyañāṇavajjho, itare dve catutthañāṇavajjhā. Oghayogesupi eseva nayo.

children: vicikicchānīvaraṇaṃ paṭhamañāṇavajjhaṃ, kāmacchando byāpādo kukkuccanti tīṇi tatiyañāṇavajjhāni, thinamiddhauddhaccāni catutthañāṇavajjhāni.
innerText: Nīvaraṇesu vicikicchānīvaraṇaṃ paṭhamañāṇavajjhaṃ, kāmacchando byāpādo kukkuccanti tīṇi tatiyañāṇavajjhāni, thinamiddhauddhaccāni catutthañāṇavajjhāni.

children: paṭhamañāṇavajjho.
sabbesampi lokiyadhammānaṃ vatthukāmavasena ‘‘kāmā’’ti āgatattā rūpārūpesu rāgopi kāmupādāne patati, tasmā tañca kāmupādānaṃ catutthañāṇavajjhaṃ, sesāni paṭhamañāṇavajjhāni.
innerText: Upādānesu sabbesampi lokiyadhammānaṃ vatthukāmavasena ‘‘kāmā’’ti āgatattā rūpārūpesu rāgopi kāmupādāne patati, tasmā tañca kāmupādānaṃ catutthañāṇavajjhaṃ, sesāni paṭhamañāṇavajjhāni.

children: diṭṭhivicikicchānusayā paṭhamañāṇavajjhā, kāmarāgapaṭighānusayā tatiyañāṇavajjhā, mānabhavarāgāvijjānusayā catutthañāṇavajjhā.
innerText: Anusayesu diṭṭhivicikicchānusayā paṭhamañāṇavajjhā, kāmarāgapaṭighānusayā tatiyañāṇavajjhā, mānabhavarāgāvijjānusayā catutthañāṇavajjhā.

children: dosamalaṃ tatiyañāṇavajjhaṃ, itarāni catutthañāṇavajjhāneva.
pāṇātipāto adinnādānaṃ micchācāro musāvādo micchādiṭṭhīti ime paṭhamañāṇavajjhā, pisuṇavācā pharusavācā byāpādoti tatiyañāṇavajjhā, samphappalāpo abhijjhā catutthañāṇavajjhāva.
innerText: Akusalakammapathesu pāṇātipāto adinnādānaṃ micchācāro musāvādo micchādiṭṭhīti ime paṭhamañāṇavajjhā, pisuṇavācā pharusavācā byāpādoti tatiyañāṇavajjhā, samphappalāpo abhijjhā catutthañāṇavajjhāva.

children: cattāro diṭṭhigatacittuppādā, vicikicchāsampayutto cāti pañca paṭhamañāṇavajjhā, dve paṭighasampayuttā tatiyañāṇavajjhā, sesā catutthañāṇavajjhāti.
innerText: Akusalacittuppādesu cattāro diṭṭhigatacittuppādā, vicikicchāsampayutto cāti pañca paṭhamañāṇavajjhā, dve paṭighasampayuttā tatiyañāṇavajjhā, sesā catutthañāṇavajjhāti.
Yañca yena vajjhaṃ, taṃ tena pahātabbaṃ nāma. Tena vuttaṃ ‘‘etesaṃ saṃyojanādīnaṃ dhammānaṃ etāni yathāyogaṃ pahānakarānī’’ti.

children: Etesu
ñāṇesu ca yena yena,

innerText: Yo yo hi dhammo samupeti ghātaṃ;
So so asesena ca tena tena,

children: Pariññādīni
kiccāni, yāni vuttāni satthunā;

innerText: Padīpo hi yathā loke, apubbācarimaṃ idha;

children: Vuttampi cetaṃ ‘‘maggasamaṅgissa ñāṇaṃ dukkhepetaṃ ñāṇaṃ, dukkhasamudayepetaṃ ñāṇaṃ, dukkhanirodhepetaṃ ñāṇaṃ, dukkhanirodhagāminiyā

paṭipadāyapetaṃ ñāṇa’’nti. Tattha yathā padīpo vaṭṭiṃ jhāpeti, evaṃ maggañāṇaṃ dukkhaṃ parijānāti. Yathā andhakāraṃ nāseti, evaṃ samudayaṃ pajahati. Yathā ālokaṃ vidaṃseti, evaṃ sahajātādipaccayatāya sammāsaṅkappādimaggaṃ bhāveti. Yathā telaṃ pariyādiyati, evaṃ kilesapariyādānena nirodhaṃ sacchikarotīti veditabbaṃ.
innerText: Vuttampi cetaṃ ‘‘maggasamaṅgissa ñāṇaṃ dukkhepetaṃ ñāṇaṃ, dukkhasamudayepetaṃ ñāṇaṃ, dukkhanirodhepetaṃ ñāṇaṃ, dukkhanirodhagāminiyā paṭipadāyapetaṃ ñāṇa’’nti. Tattha yathā padīpo vaṭṭiṃ jhāpeti, evaṃ maggañāṇaṃ dukkhaṃ parijānāti. Yathā andhakāraṃ nāseti, evaṃ samudayaṃ pajahati. Yathā ālokaṃ vidaṃseti, evaṃ sahajātādipaccayatāya sammāsaṅkappādimaggaṃ bhāveti. Yathā telaṃ pariyādiyati, evaṃ kilesapariyādānena nirodhaṃ sacchikarotīti veditabbaṃ.

children: Obhāseti
ca rūpāni, nāseti timirampi ca;
innerText: Obhāseti ca rūpāni, nāseti timirampi ca;
Yathā ca mahatī nāvā, apubbācarimaṃ pana;
Jahatī orimaṃ tīraṃ, sotaṃ chindati sā pana;

children: Yathā
chindati taṃ sotaṃ, taṇhaṃ jahati taṃ tathā;
innerText: Yathā chindati taṃ sotaṃ, taṇhaṃ jahati taṃ tathā;
Yathā vahati taṃ bhaṇḍaṃ, sahajātādinā pana.
Tatheva paccayattena, maggaṃ bhāveti nāma so;
Yathā pāraṃ pana evaṃ, nirodhārammaṇaṃ bhave.

children: Ko
hi nāma naro loke,
